dataset_id: SAFARI 2000 Mean Climatology, 0.5-Deg, 1930-1960, V[ersion]. 2.1 (Cramer and Leemans)
title: SAFARI 2000 Mean Climatology, 0.5-Deg, 1930-1960, V[ersion]. 2.1 (Cramer and Leemans)
summary: This data set is a subset of Cramer and Leeman's (1999) global mean monthly climatology . The subset is for the area of southern Africa within the following bounds: 5 N to 35 S and 5 E to 60 E. The data are available in ASCII grid and binary image formats.

cmr.Instrument: TEMPERATURE SENSORS, RAIN GAUGES, SUN PHOTOMETERS
